ygData.subject: Re: GZ answers
ygData.msgSnippet: I hardly suspect that would be the case, since Abashi cut my name from the reply & used, IMO, a derogatory title for his reply post. Rokenn ...
ygData.messageBody:
I hardly suspect that would be the case, since Abashi cut my name from the
reply & used, IMO, a derogatory title for his reply post.

Rokenn


>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] GZ answers
>Date: Fri, 7 Jan 2000 10:03:08 -1000
>
>Rokenn,
>
>My line of thinking assumed that Abashi and GZ, after replying to your
>post,
>would check back to read the inevitable followup replies from everyone
>participating in the thread. My assumption is that they would be more
>likely to notice a thread with your name on it than the others since you
>started the thread.
>
>Galtin of E'ci (who is in the Army and knows all the problems that can
>arise
>from assuming people will do what you expect them to do)
>
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Rokenn Swiftsong [SMTP:rokenn@...]
> > Sent: Friday, January 07, 2000 7:40 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] GZ answers
> >
> > I hardly think I am high up on GZ's favorites list. As it took him
>nearly
> > 2
> > months to reply to this. I sent him the first draft of these questions
> > back in mid november. The anfter posting it on the Sony EQ board it had
> > to
> > be bump nearly 300 times before abashi even acknowledged it.
> >
> > Rokenn
> >
> >
> > >From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> > >Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > >To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > >Subject: [eqbards] GZ answers
> > >Date: Thu, 6 Jan 2000 15:45:47 -1000
> > >
> > >Rokenn,
> > >
> > >Since you were able to get a response from Abashi and GZ, you might
>want
> > to
> > >send them a reminder for when they fix the percussion aspect of
>Furfil's
> > >Curtailing Chant. Lets assume after they code the fix equipping a drum
> > >will
> > >now increase the damage of the DOT and the amount of magic resistance
>the
> > >mobs loses. I think we should remind them to remember the MM battle
>drum
> > >when they code the fix. Singing Furfil's with the MM battle drum
> > equipped
> > >should increase the DOT and magic resistance amount 20% (I think thats
> > what
> > >everyone says it increases resist songs by) more than with a normal
>drum
> > >equipped. Based on their track record, if we don't remind them they
>will
> > >probably forget about including the MM battle drum as part of the
>patch.
> > >
> > >Galtin of E'ci
> > >
> > > > >>>Fufil's Curtailing Chant and the other Chant songs, The
>percussion
> > > > aspect
> > > > >>>of these songs is broken. Using a drum produces no additional
> > effect
> > > > >>>(damage or resistance debuff).
> > > >
> > > > ***GZ SAYS***
> > > > Hmm - don't use that one much. I'll check. If so, we'll get it fixed
> > >right
> > > >
> > > > up.
> > > > **************
> > > >
